name: Super Mario Bros New Trick
description:
Here I have made a game called Super Mario Bros New Trick For Android. I have decided to make my own version of Mario Bros and it is very awesome game.

Super Mario Bros APK FAQ’s

Can I Play Super Mario Bros on my Mobile?

Yes, If you can run KitKat 4.4 or later, you can play the super mario apk game

Anyone who owns an Android device, whether it be a phone, tablet, or even a Chromebook, will be able to play Mario Kart Tour as long as the device is running KitKat 4.4 or later

How to play Super Mario bros Games on Android?

Here, are the few tips and directions to play your favorite super mario bros apk on your android smartphone..

1. Get ready for your character to move. Super Mario Run is an automatic running game. …

2. Tap to jump. …

3. Jump higher by tapping and holding the screen.

4. Spin in the mid-air tap by holding to jump and tapping while in midair.

5.Reverse jump from the wall to “climb”. …

6. Collect coins. …

7. Use action blocks.

Is Super Mario Bros Free ?

Yes, it’s free on android mobile You’ll be able to download it, and play a few levels, for free on December 15. But that’s just for a tiny taste.
